title: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority to submit an annual report detailing energy efficiency savings achieved in grant recipients' properties
summary: Requires the New York state research and development authority to examine energy efficiency savings achieved in grant recipients' properties; requires that an annual report be submitted to the governor and legislature.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the New York state energy research and development authority to submit an annual report detailing energy efficiency savings achieved in grant recipients' properties
